Verses: 1 kallaththaraasu Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanadhu; Sumuththiraiyaana Niraikallo Avarukkup Piriyam.
2 agandhai Vandhaal Lachchaiyum Varum; Thaazhndha Sindhaiyullavargalidaththil Gnaanam Undu.
3 semmaiyaanavargaludaiya Uththamam Avargalai Nadaththum; Dhrogigalin Maarupaado Avargalaip Paazhaakkum.
4 kobaakkinai Naalil Aisuvariyam Udhavaadhu; Needhiyo Maranaththukkuth Thappuvikkum.
5 uththamanudaiya Needhi Avan Vazhiyai Semmaippaduththum; Dhunmaarkkano Than Dhunmaarkkaththinaal Vizhuvaan.
6 semmaiyaanavargaludaiya Needhi Avargalaith Thappuvikkum; Dhrogigalo Thangal Theevinaiyile Pidipaduvaargal.
7 dhunmaarkkan Marikkumbodhu Avan Nambikkai Azhiyum; Akkiramakkaararin Abetchai Kettuppom.
8 needhimaan Ikkattinindru Viduvikkappaduvaan; Avan Irundha Idaththile Dhunmaarkkan Varuvaan.
9 maayakkaaran Thanakku Aduththavanai Vaayinaal Kedukkiraan; Needhimaano Arivinaal Thappugiraan.
10 needhimaangal Nandraayirundhaal Pattanam Kalikoorum; Dhunmaarkkar Azhindhaal Gambeeram Undaagum.
11 semmaiyaanavargaludaiya Aaseervaadhaththinaal Pattanam Nilaipetrongum; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Vaayinaal Adhu Idindhu Vizhum.
12 madhikettavan Piranai Avamadhikkiraan; Buththimaano Than Vaayai Adakkikkondirukkiraan.
13 purankoorith Thirigiravan Ragasiyaththai Velippaduththugiraan; Aaviyil Unmaiyullavano Kaariyaththai Adakkugiraan.
14 aalosanaiyillaadha Idaththil Janangal Vizhundhupovaargal; Anega Aalosanaikkaarar Undaanaal Sugam Undaagum.
15 anniyanukkaagap Pinaippadugiravan Vegu Paadupaduvaan; Pinaippaduvadhai Veruppavan Sugamaayiruppaan.
16 nallozhukkamulla Sthree Maanaththaik Kaappaal; Paraakkiramasaaligal Aisuvariyaththaik Kaappaargal.
17 dhayaiyulla Manushan Than Aaththumaavukku Nanmaiseydhukollugiraan; Kadoorano Than Udalai Alaikkazhikkiraan.
18 dhunmaarkkan Virudhaavelaiyai Seygiraan; Needhiyai Vidhaikkiravano Meyppalanaip Peruvaan.
19 needhi Jeevanukku Edhuvaagiradhupol Theemaiyaip Pinthodarugiravan Maranaththukku Edhuvaagiraan.
20 maarupaadulla Irudhayamudaiyavargal Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavargal; Uththama Maarkkaththaaro Avarukkup Piriyamaanavargal.
21 kaiyode Kaikorththaalum, Dhushtan Thandanaikkuth Thappaan; Needhimaangaludaiya Sandhadhiyo Viduvikkappadum.
22 madhikedaai Nadakkira Azhagulla Sthree, Pandriyin Mookkilulla Pon Mookkuththikku Samaanam.
23 needhimaangaludaiya Aasai Nanmaiye; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Nambikkaiyo Kobaakkinaiyaai Mudiyum.
24 vaariyiraiththum Viruththiyadaivaarum Undu; Adhigamaaip Pisiniththanampanniyum Varumaiyadaivaarum Undu.
25 udhaaragunamulla Aaththumaa Sezhikkum; Evan Thanneer Paaichchugiraano Avanukkuth Thanneer Paaichchappadum.
26 dhaaniyaththaik Kattivaikkiravanai Janangal Sabippaargal; Virkiravanudaiya Thalaiyinmel Aaseervaadham Thangum.
27 nanmaiyai Jaakkiradhaiyudan Thedugiravan Dhayaiyaip Peruvaan; Theemaiyaith Thedugiravanukko Theemaiye Varum.
28 than Aisuvariyaththai Nambugiravan Vizhuvaan; Needhimaangalo Thuliraippole Thazhaippaargal.
29 than Veettaik Kalaikkiravan Kaatrai Sudhandharippaan; Moodan Gnaanamullavanukku Adimaiyaavaan.
30 needhimaanudaiya Balan Jeevavirutcham; Aaththumaakkalai Aadhaayappaduththikkollugiravan Gnaanamullavan.
31 idho, Needhimaanukku Boomiyil Sarikkattappadume; Dhunmaarkkanukkum Paavikkum Eththanai Adhigam.
